field.name: path
field.title: Path
field.comment: Path to match against (using MySQL's LIKE operator)

field.name: priority
field.title: Priority
field.comment: Higher priority rules are matched first

field.name: origins
field.title: Origins
field.comment: A comma separated list of allowed origins or '*'. Used to create the 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' response header

field.name: headers
field.title: Headers
field.comment: A comma separated list of allowed headers or '*'. Used to create the 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers' response header

field.name: methods
field.title: Methods
field.comment: A comma separated list of allowed methods or '*'. Used to create the 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods' response header

field.name: max_age
field.title: Max age
field.comment: Maximum number of seconds the results can be cached. Use to create the 'Access-Control-Max-Age' response header
